GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.15.91
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_fs: Prevent race during ffs_ep0_queue_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.91 by commit ae8e136bcaae96163b5821984de1036efc9abb1a, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit ddf8abd2599491cbad959c700b90ba72a5dce8d0. For more details please see the references link.
